title: Himi 30
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Pea hao leva
‘A e laumālie
Pea fiefia
Pea fakafeta’i
‘I he’ene ‘ilo loto
‘A e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki.
2.
Kuo huhu’ia
Hoku laumālie
Pea u ongosia
‘I he’eku hia,
Pea u tui kia Sīsū
Pea u fiemālie ai.
3.
Ko e toki ‘ofa
Fakamanavahē
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ki he kakai hia,
Pea ko e hao’anga
Ki māmani kotoa pē.
4.
Na’e kalusefai
‘A hoku ‘Otua
Pea pekia ai
Ko e fetongi au,
Pea ko e hifo ia
Ki māmani kotoa pē.
5.
Ka ne ‘iate au
‘A e le’o lahi
Pea u lea ‘aki
Ki he anga kovi
‘O māmani kotoa pē
Ke nau fai mo kumi ki ai. *
